enrichedWines.productName: Rock Ferry Trig Hill Pinot Noir 2022
enrichedWines.description: A New Zealand Pinot Noir from Rock Ferry's Trig Hill vineyard, showcasing the elegance and purity of fruit that defines quality Central Otago or Marlborough Pinot Noir.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromatic with red cherry, raspberry, and cranberry. Floral notes of violet and rose petal. Subtle earthy and herbal complexity.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with silky tannins and bright acidity. Pure red fruit flavors with earthy undertones and subtle spice. Elegant and refined.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with persistent fruit and fine tannins.

wineDetails.region: New Zealand (likely Central Otago or Marlborough)

enrichedWines.productName: Darms Lane Pinot Noir Russian River Valley 2018
enrichedWines.description: A premium Pinot Noir from Russian River Valley's renowned terroir, crafted by Darms Lane with careful vineyard selection and winemaking. This vintage has developed complexity with age.

tastingNotes.aroma: Complex with red cherry, strawberry, and earth. Notes of mushroom, forest floor, and subtle oak spice from aging. Elegant and layered.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with silky tannins. Red fruit flavors with savory notes of earth, tea, and spice. Beautiful integration and depth.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with persistent fruit and earthy notes.

wineDetails.region: Russian River Valley, Sonoma County, California

enrichedWines.description: An organic red wine from Chateau Maris in Languedoc, showcasing biodynamic farming and minimal intervention winemaking. 'La Touge' represents the estate's commitment to terroir expression.

tastingNotes.aroma: Ripe with dark fruit, garrigue herbs, and earthy notes. Black olive, lavender, and subtle oak spice. Organic/biodynamic character shines through.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins. Dark fruit flavors with savory Mediterranean character—herbs, earth, and minerality.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, earthy finish with persistent fruit and herbal notes.

enrichedWines.productName: Optima Alexander Valley Duffy Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve 2014
enrichedWines.description: A premium reserve Cabernet from the prestigious Duffy Vineyard in Alexander Valley. This wine has had significant aging, developing tertiary complexity while maintaining structure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Mature and complex with blackcurrant, cedar, and tobacco. Notes of leather, earth, and dried herbs from aging. Integrated oak showing vanilla and spice.
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with resolved tannins and balanced acidity. Dark fruit flavors with savory complexity—earth, tobacco, and cedar. Elegant and refined.
tastingNotes.finish: Very long finish with persistent fruit, soft tannins, and complex tertiary notes.

wineDetails.region: Duffy Vineyard, Alexander Valley, Sonoma, California

enrichedWines.description: A fresh Spanish white wine from the Marina Alta region in Alicante, showcasing indigenous Mediterranean varieties and coastal terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh with citrus, white flowers, and subtle herbal notes. Clean Mediterranean character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity. Citrus and orchard fruit with mineral backbone. Refreshing and balanced.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering citrus and mineral notes.

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Blend of indigenous Spanish white varieties

enrichedWines.description: A historic Gran Reserva from Bodegas Riojanas' Monte Real line, over 20 years old. This wine represents traditional Rioja at its finest with extensive aging and tertiary development.

tastingNotes.aroma: Profoundly complex with dried cherry, fig, and prune. Extensive tertiary notes of leather, tobacco, cedar, and earth. Oxidative character with walnut and caramel. Museum-quality aromatics.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft, integrated tannins. Dried fruit flavors with savory complexity—leather, tobacco, mushroom, and aged balsamic. Remarkable freshness for age.
tastingNotes.finish: Extremely long, complex finish with persistent tertiary notes and elegant structure.

enrichedWines.description: A fresh Arneis from Piedmont's Roero region, showcasing the delicate aromatics and crisp character of this traditional white variety.

tastingNotes.aroma: Delicate with white flowers, pear, and green apple. Subtle almond and citrus notes.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with bright acidity. Citrus and stone fruit with mineral backbone and characteristic bitter almond finish.
tastingNotes.finish: Clean finish with lingering fruit and almond notes.

enrichedWines.productName: Ribera del Guadiana Zaleo Joven Tempranillo 2022
enrichedWines.description: A young, fresh Tempranillo from the Ribera del Guadiana region in Extremadura, Spain. 'Joven' style means minimal aging for vibrant fruit character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Bright with fresh cherry, plum, and berry. Subtle herbal notes and floral character.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with soft tannins and juicy fruit. Red cherry and berry flavors with fresh acidity. Approachable and vibrant.

enrichedWines.description: A crisp New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc from Rock Ferry, showcasing the vibrant aromatics and refreshing acidity that made the variety famous in Marlborough.

tastingNotes.aroma: Explosively aromatic with grapefruit, lime, and passion fruit. Herbaceous notes of cut grass and jalapeño. Mineral undertones.
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with razor-sharp acidity. Intense citrus and tropical fruit with herbaceous character. Vibrant and refreshing.
tastingNotes.finish: Long, zesty finish with persistent citrus and mineral notes.
